thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Lukas Podolski set for move to Japan | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Lukas Podolski set for move to Japan | Metro News

author: Metro Sport Reporter For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal transfer news: Lukas Podolski set for move to Japan | Metro News
text:
Ex-Arsenal man Lukas Podolski set for move to Japan gossip Metro Sport Reporter for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 6:16 pm Podolski is set for a move to Japan (Picture: AFP/Getty) 
Former Arsenal attacker Lukas Podolski is set to become the latest player to move to Asia but he will not be joining the Chinese Super League. 
The German World Cup winner has only made nine starts for Galatasaray this season and is ready to leave the Turkish giants. 
And he will now link up with Japanese side Vissel Kobe, according to beIN Sports. 
The move may be seen by some as a step down as Vissel have never finished higher than seventh in the J-League since reaching the top flight in 1997. 
But the former Bayern Munich ace, who has been capped by Germany 129 times, will have a chance to push them up the league.
